lu.uni.lassy.excalibur.examples.icrash.dev.java.environment.actors

Class ActAuthenticatedImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • lu.uni.lassy.excalibur.examples.icrash.dev.java.environment.actors.ActAuthenticatedImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote, ActAuthenticated, JIntIsActor
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActAdministratorImpl, ActCoordinatorImpl

    public abstract class ActAuthenticatedImpl
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements ActAuthenticated
    The Class ActAuthenticatedImpl, which creates a server side actor of type authenticated. It is an abstract class, so must be created by another actor, like the coordinator
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
